DOC.brief_summary: This study verify efficacy fluvoxamine maleate give 10 week treatment child adolescents obsessive-compulsive disorder
DOC.brief_title: Fluvoxamine Maleate Treatment Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder : A Post-marketing Clinical Study Children Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Have minimum total score 16 JCYBOCS , Weight within standard weight Â± 2S.D . base standard weight age School Health Statistical Survey Exclusion Criteria Have follow predominant psychiatric diagnosis Schizophrenia Have previously treat fluvoxamine maleate
